title: This is my home
creator_credit: Herschells Films and Roy A. Driver
brief_description: Care and accommodation for the elderly in Victoria; shows the variety of specially planned homes available - individual houses with gardens in selectged areas; units of ten self-contained flats; flatettes with a community lounge; large homes with a matron presiding; small hospitals where patients are encouraged to walk again. Also stresses the importance of practising handicrafts, hobbies and gardening and being generally active.
